repairbox

A Python-based framework for conducting high-quality empirical studies of software artefacts.

Quick search

Coverage¶

Coverage API¶

class CoverageReport¶

Provides complete line coverage information for all files and across all tests within a given project.

static from_string(s: str) → repairbox.coverage.CoverageReport¶

Loads a coverage report from a string-based XML description.

static from_xml(root: xml.etree.ElementTree.Element) → repairbox.coverage.CoverageReport¶

Transforms an XML tree, produced by gcovr, into its corresponding CoverageReport object.

files¶

A list of the names of the files that are included in this report.

__getitem__(filename: str) → repairbox.coverage.FileCoverageReport¶

Alias for file.

file(name: str) → repairbox.coverage.FileCoverageReport¶

Returns the coverage information for a given file within the project associated with this report.
